BriefDescription: Number of requests allocated in Coherency Tracker.
Each cycle counts number of any coherent request at memory controller that were issued by any core.
Each cycle counts number of coherent reads pending on data return from memory controller that were issued by any core.
This event is deprecated. Refer to new event UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD
This event is deprecated. Refer to new event UNC_ARB_DAT_OCCUPANCY.ALL

Each cycle count number of 'valid' coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_OCCUPANCY.RD]
Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_REQUESTS.RD]
Each cycle counts number of all outgoing valid entries in ReqTrk. Such entry is defined as valid from its allocation in ReqTrk till deallocation. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.

Each cycle count number of 'valid' coherent Data Read entries . Such entry is defined as valid when it is allocated till deallocation. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_OCCUPANCY.DRD]
Counts the number of coherent and in-coherent requests initiated by IA cores, processor graphic units, or LLC.
Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD]
